message: If it's poor management, maybe an intelligent traffic light system could help
If it's simply too much traffic, perhaps a car pooling app could help people find rides and reduce the number of cars on the road
I'm trying to fix the traffic problem here in mi city - it's truly a mess. I'm thinking about how I could do that, maybe have an app that tells you how long you are gonna wait for the next bus...
Do you have traffic reports available on GPS / Google Maps where you are? If not maybe that would be a good product, keep track of jams and your customers get diverted around them
